ThingDef.label: shelf vinny 8
ThingDef.description: A triple-stack shelf that holds 8 times as much as empty ground. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.\n\nSince shelf space is limited, shelves cannot hold chunks, buildings, plants and large corpses.

ThingDef.label: shelf vinny 16
ThingDef.description: A triple-stack shelf that holds 8 times as much as empty ground. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.\n\nSince shelf space is limited, shelves cannot hold chunks, buildings, plants and large corpses.

HediffDef.label: hand talon by vinny
HediffDef.description: An installed hand talon by vinny.

ThingDef.label: hand talon by vinny
ThingDef.description: A razor-sharp talon which extends from a hidden opening between the middle and ring fingers. The talon is longer than the palm, but it becomes flexible upon retracting, allowing the user to curl it up and conceal it inside the hand. It can perform rapid slashing attacks, but is poor at penetrating armor.

RecipeDef.label: install hand talon by vinny
RecipeDef.description: Install a hand talon by vinny.

HediffDef.label: elbow blade by vinny
HediffDef.description: An installed elbow blade by vinny.

ThingDef.label: elbow blade by vinny
ThingDef.description: A razor-sharp blade that extends at will from a hidden opening at the end of the ulna. Appearing without warning, it can be used for devastating slice attacks.

RecipeDef.label: install elbow blade by vinny
RecipeDef.description: Install an elbow blade by vinny.

ThingDef.label: fast monosword by vinny
ThingDef.description: A crystal-metallic longsword infused with mechanites that maintain a mono-molecular cutting edge. It cuts through even thick armor with ease, and its light weight permits fast attacks.
